pageContent: Background: While effective treatment of prostate cancer with radiotherapy and hormones increase survival, adverse effects may reduce quality of life (QoL). The aim of this study was to investigate frequency and severity of self-assessed late adverse effects, and identify the patients most exposed.

metaData.source:
Hypoxia Patterns in Primary and Metastatic Prostate Cancer Environments
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/30639975/
